text: Crust Combine the melted butter, 1/4 cup granulated sugar, and graham cracker crumbs in a medium bowl.  Add the mixture on the bottom of four half pint canning jars. Scoop 1/4 of the mixture in each jar. Press the mixture down in each jar with a spoon.  Cheesecake Add the whipped topping and cream cheese in a large bowl. Use an electric mixer or whisk to thoroughly combine them. Blend in the vanilla extract, sliced strawberries, and 2/3 cup granulated sugar in the bowl. You'll want everything incorporated and more on the fluffy side. Add the mixture to the jars on top of the crust. Scoop 1/4 of the mixture in each jar. Secure the jars with lids. Allow them to chill in the refrigerator until they're ready to be served. Garnish the dessert before eating. You can add additional whipped topping or a strawberry slice. Finished.
